recommendations: Tobias Artz
Lead Engineer / Systems Architect at South Hill Designs
October 25, 2016, Tobias was a client of John’s

I have been a software engineer for the last 6+ years and am very familiar with recruiters reaching out for "the next best thing". Unfortunately most of these recruiters are more focused on getting their commission than finding the right fit for me as a candidate and for the recruiting client.John is definitely the exception to the norm. He has placed me at one of the best positions I have had so far and made sure that the fit was right for both ends. I have stayed in touch with John even after I took on new roles at different companies. It is not uncommon for me to reach out to him and hear what else is out there or for him to reach out to me to see how I am doing career wise.John’s professionalism and work ethics are top notch and I would highly recommend him.

Software Engineer III at SkyTouch Technology
September 22, 2016, Nicholas was a client of John’s

When my family decided we were ready for a change and that we wanted to move half-way across the country, I contacted multiple agencies in the Phoenix area looking for job leads.  I have to say that John, by far, was the most dedicated and accommodating person I had the pleasure to work with.  Not only did he present multiple options to me, but he was cognizant of my needs and very upfront and honest with his opinions of the prospective companies and positions which I really appreciated.On top of all of this John has went above and beyond in following up with me to ensure that this job truly was a good fit.  I've dealt with other recruiters and headhunters who are never heard from again after being placed and I am happy to say that is not the experience I had this time.

Alan Rother
Software Development Manager at Amazon.com
September 11, 2016, Alan worked with John but at different companies

I haven't had much success with recruiters over the years. They're typically little more than shell scripts in suits charging 20% to forward you a resume and occasionally buy you lunch. John is not that guy. He has been one of the most valued members of my team for the last few years - I have never managed to find the depth of talent John consistently sends my way when I need a new hire. He genuinely knows his business, constantly maintains great relationships with both job seekers and employers and is always on the lookout for opportunities for both.

Carrie L. Vega
Senior Director Global Marketing
September 24, 2015, Carrie L. was a client of John’s

I would highly recommend John to any individual in need of valuable connections and opportunities for professional placement.  He is a very qualified, highly driven professional who sincerely listens to the individuals he supports and represents.  John made my experience with him great as I found him to be very intuitive and genuine with his recommendations.  I never felt like my placement or the opportunities that he presented were for his gain alone, but rather for my best interest and the true mutual fit of the opportunity.  He was super communicative and was very proactive in keeping me updated.  During my experience with John, I was faced with two wonderful offers – one was with his client and one was with a colleagues client – I can say that John helped me work through the decision process, never once attempting to sway my decision.  He truly was just there to help me make the right decision.  I would highly recommend John and would go to him as a resource if ever needed as I feel he truly represents me and my best interest as well as the interest of his business clients.

summary: John Wolff specializes in placing direct hire and project professionals within the Information Technology field across all major industries in the Greater Phoenix area. John has great experience in specialized recruiting and partners closely with local IT managers and executives to match top IT talent with top companies in the Phoenix-metro area. I would love the opportunity to help your business grow by providing top tier IT talent! In addition, if you know anyone in your peer group who is interested in hearing about career opportunities within IT, feel free to contact me. Referrals are always welcomed!I can be reached at 602-595-9900 or via email at jwolff@vincentbenjamin.com. SpecialtiesRecruiting, Sourcing, Interviewing, Sales, Networking, Negotiating, Consulting, Engineers, Programmers, Developer, Software Developer, Designers, JAVA/J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Agile, Scrum, DBA, ERP, .NET, C#, ASP.NET, MVC,WCF,WF, SQL,noSQL, MongoDB, NodeJS, AngularJS, KnockoutJS, Cognos, SharePoint, Business Analysts, Project Managers, SDLC, Business Objects, TIBCO, PHP, CRM, Python, Flex, Jquery, CSS, security, CISSP, CCIE, BizTalk, SEO, UI/UX, LAMP, AWS, Azure and anything IT related.
